Java SE 14 & JDK 14

Uses of Interface
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter

Packages that use XMLStreamWriter 
Package Description
javax.xml.stream
Defines interfaces and classes for the Streaming API for XML (StAX).
javax.xml.transform.stax
Provides StAX specific transformation classes.
